==== file.tsx (1 errors) ====
    import React = require('react');
                           ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2307: Cannot find module 'react' or its corresponding type declarations.
    
    interface Prop {
        a: number,
        b: string
    }
    
    declare class MyComp<P extends Prop> extends React.Component<P, {}> {
        internalProp: P;
    }
    
    // Error
    let x1 = <MyComp />
    
    // OK
    let x = <MyComp a={10} b="hi" />
    
    // Error
    let x2 = <MyComp a="hi"/>
